text: Monty Python's The Meaning of Life is a 1983 British musical sketch comedy movie. It is Monty Python's last movie. It is about seven stages of life and is told through different sketches and songs. ==Other websites== * Category:1983 musical movies Category:1983 comedy movies Category:1980s satirical movies Category:British musical movies Category:British comedy movies Category:English-language movies Category:Monty Python Category:Universal Pictures movies
title: Monty Python's The Meaning of Life
